results.title: Low glucose enhanced metformin's inhibitory effect on pancreatic cancer cells by suppressing glycolysis and inducing energy stress via up-regulation of miR-210-5p
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ significantly inhibited the expression of phosphorylation-@GENE_PFKFB2 @GENE_5208 @@@PFKFB2@@@(p-PFKFB2) in the low-@CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ group and inhibited the LDH activity both in the low and high @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ groups, thus inhibiting anaerobic @<m>DISEASE_Myopathy_with_Lactic_Acidosis_Hereditary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564972 @@@glycolysis@@@ and inducing energy stress.

citations.NLM: Ma M, Ma C, Li P, Ma C, Ping F, Li W, Xu L, Zhang H, Sun Q, Li Y. Low glucose enhanced metformin's inhibitory effect on pancreatic cancer cells by suppressing glycolysis and inducing energy stress via up-regulation of miR-210-5p Cell Cycle. 2020 Sep;19(17):2168-2181. PMID: 32718270
